nodes.text: Eislomi III (aka, Eislo) was a New Republic planet in the Eislomi system in Eislomi sector with a HoloNet relay station. On the planet, ratter thists were used to guard livestock in mountain valleys. Many products were exported from Eislomi III, including cordioline trehansicol, one of the only insecticides that could exterminate metalmites.
Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, confirmed during discussions about The Essential Atlas Online Companion that Eislomi and Eislo are the same world.
